title_zh: 2025年新加坡南洋理工大学AI探索项目
description_en: We warmly invite outstanding high school students passionate about artificial intelligence to join us in exploring the mysteries of AI and its impact on the future of society. From January 20 to January 24, 2025, participants will engage in a 5-day AI Exploration Program at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore. By learning cutting-edge AI technologies such as ChatGPT, students will gain a global perspective and insights into the latest advancements in the field. This program offers a unique opportunity to experience life at a world-leading university while developing critical skills for the future.
description_zh: 诚邀对人工智能充满热情的优秀高中生加入，共同探索AI领域的奥秘及其对未来社会的影响。2025年1月20日至1月24日，参与者将在新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU）参加为期5天的AI探索项目。通过学习ChatGPT等前沿AI技术，学生将获得全球视野，了解该领域的最新进展。此项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，体验世界顶尖大学的学习生活，同时培养未来所需的关键技能。
highlights_en:
Official Courses: Taught by NTU’s distinguished faculty on campus, ensuring high-quality educational content.

Top University Experience: Immerse in the academic atmosphere of a world-class university and preview university life.

Industry Visits: Explore leading Singaporean companies to gain insights into cutting-edge industry trends.

Diverse Enrichment: Covers global awareness and cultural experiences, enhancing overall personal development.

University Application Guidance: Professional support from experts to assist with future university applications.
highlights_zh:
官方课程：由南洋理工大学资深教授团队在NTU校园授课，确保高质量的教学内容。

名校体验：亲身感受顶尖大学的学习氛围，提前体验名校生活。

企业参访：走进新加坡知名企业，深入了解行业前沿动态。

多元拓展：涵盖国际化认知、文化体验等，全面提升个人综合能力。

申学辅导：专业机构提供申学指导，助力未来大学申请。

[Day 3]

Afternoon: AI Applications (3), Group discussion and exchange
Evening: Free time

[Day 4]
Morning: AI Applications (4)
Afternoon: AI Applications Course
Evening: Closing dinner and course review

[Day 5]
Morning: AI Applications Course summary, Certificate ceremony, Closing ceremony
Afternoon: Departure

下午：第二轮接机并安排入住酒店

features_en:
Target Audience: Outstanding high school students in Grade 9 and above.

Language of Instruction: English.

Program Location: Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore.

Core Theme: Artificial Intelligence, ChatGPT, and their societal impact.

Skills Development: Critical thinking, teamwork, and global perspective.
features_zh:
招生对象：9年级及以上优秀高中生。

授课语言：英语。

项目地点：新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU）。

核心主题：人工智能、ChatGPT及其对社会的影响。

能力培养：批判性思维、团队合作和全球视野。
school_info_en:
NTU’s Role in AI and Technology

Nanyang Technological University (NTU) stands at the forefront of artificial intelligence research and development, with key initiatives including:

AI Research Hub: Focused on machine learning, natural language processing, and robotics.

Partnerships with Tech Giants: Collaborations with companies like Alibaba, Tencent, and NVIDIA to advance AI applications.

AI for Social Good: Projects leveraging AI to address societal challenges in healthcare, education, and environmental sustainability.

By participating in this NTU program, students will experience one of the world’s most innovative academic environments, preparing them for success in an AI-driven future.

Nanyang Technological University: Where Innovation Meets Excellence!
school_info_zh:
南洋理工大学在AI与技术领域的角色

南洋理工大学（NTU）处于人工智能研究与发展的前沿，其重要举措包括：

AI研究中心：专注于机器学习、自然语言处理和机器人技术。

与科技巨头的合作：与阿里巴巴、腾讯和英伟达等公司合作，推动AI技术的应用与发展。

AI造福社会：利用AI技术解决社会挑战的项目，如医疗保健、教育和环境可持续发展。

通过参加NTU的这一项目，学生将亲身体验全球最具创新性的学术环境，为未来在AI驱动的世界中取得成功做好准备。

南洋理工大学：创新与卓越的交汇之地！
